message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can take the smaller share, I'll take the bigger one!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but not too big!
Take the crumbs, I'll take the cake!
I'll give you a decent share, but not too much!
You're almost out of time, take the last crumbs!
I'll give you a small chance to reconsider, but not much!
You're running out of time, take the last penny!
